item.title: Tenants are constantly plugging their extension lead to the communual socket, 15th October
item.description:
Tenants from 14 Gleneagles Close are constantly plugging their extension lead into the communal socket. I already informed the owner, and he spoke to the,m but they are still doing it, I am not happy with the fact that I need to pay for them using the corridor electric. Please arrange to disable the electric socket

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ryder Drive, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet
